usefulItems: baking trays (30 x 40 cm), baking paper, bowl, fine-mesh sieve, ceramic baking dish (23 x 31 cm), thermal serving bowl or other large bowl, oven
title: Sweet potato lasagne

ingredients.content: 2 sweet potatoes (approx. 600 g), peeled and cut into thin slices lengthways (approx. 3-5 mm)
1 tbsp extra virgin olive oil, plus extra for greasing
1 celery stalk, cut into pieces (approx. 2-3 cm)
400 g canned chickpeas, rinsed and drained (approx. 250 g after draining)

preparations.content: Preheat oven to 200°C. Line 2 baking trays (30 x 40 cm) with baking paper. Arrange sweet potato slices onto prepared baking trays and bake for 15-20 minutes (200°C), while still retaining some firmness. Meanwhile, proceed with recipe.

Place milk, cornflour, butter, nutritional yeast and salt into mixing bowl and cook <b>7 min/90°C/speed 4<b>. Transfer into a thermal serving bowl or other large bowl and set aside. Clean and dry mixing bowl.

hintsAndTricks: To make your own vegan butter and cheese, refer to recipes on this recipe chip. We used our Cashew cheddar cheese in this recipe.

With a cheesy, umami flavour, nutritional yeast contains all nine essential amino acids, is a great source of B vitamins and is often fortified with vitamin B12 (important for those following a vegan diet). You can find nutritional yeast at health food stores or online.
You can use either Mushroom stock paste (refer to the recipe on this recipe chip) or Vegetable stock paste (please refer to the recipe in The Basic Cookbook) in this recipe.
